title: Ticket #2762: add option to retry sending failed updates in condor_advertise
description:
When condor_advertise -multiple is used, it has been observed to occasionally fail in sending a few ads out of 100 between UCSD and CERN. The reason is that the 1s timeout in DaemonCore for receipt of a command is being exceeded, perhaps because an ad gets split across multiple packets and network failures introduce a delay.

It would be nice if the tool could retry sending the failed ads.
